en.today: The Cancer New Moon offers the promise of new beginnings, dear Aries, especially when it comes to your home life and private affairs. Jupiter's influence in this lunation suggests positive changes will unfold throughout the next six months, especially when you set clear intentions around what you want. However, it'll be vital that you take care of yourself along this journey. A helping hand from Mars will make it easier to get organized, but you'll need to implement routines that are consistent and maximize efficiency without compromising your health. Connect with your intuition to decipher what you require to thrive truly.

en.today: Everything you need can be found within, dearest Leo. As the Cancer New Moon conjuncts Jupiter in your solar twelfth house, lucky epiphanies are bound to emerge. Take time to fully honor the voice within, prioritizing solitude so your intuition has a chance to speak up. Connecting with passions can provide a newfound sense of motivation and gratitude while Mars activates. Bring creative visions into the material realms to make the most of these vibes. Think outside of the box when Mercury and Uranus align later tonight, focusing on any obstacles that are complicating your journey forward.

en.today: The Cancer New Moon graces our skies early this morning, darling bull, forming a sweet connection with lucky Jupiter. Find the quiet your mind requires to brainstorm and dream, getting serious about what you want the next six months to look like. The spiritual nature of this astrological event suggests the universe will be eager to help with your aspirations when you express a desire for help. Meanwhile, Mars activates to increase your lust for life, boosting confidence as your creative instincts sharpen. Pay attention to flashes of brilliance that find you later tonight when Mercury and Uranus align.

en.today: Wealth is on your mind during the Cancer New Moon, dear Gemini, heightening your senses and connection with the material realms. A desire for more luxury will inspire you to seek additional funding, and brilliant money-making ideas could dramatically increase your earning potential. Jupiter and Mars' influence in this lunation brings a Midas touch to your efforts, offering success to all that you nurture. Don't be afraid to operate slightly outside of your comfort zone when you have solid foundations to fall back on. Exciting developments will shift your perspective later tonight when Mercury and Uranus align.

kh.today: ទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិគឺស្ថិតនៅក្នុងគំនិតរបស់អ្នកក្នុងកំឡុងពេលនៃមហារីកមហារីក, ព្រះច័ន្ទថ្មី, Gremini ជាទីស្រឡាញ់, កំពុងបង្កើនអារម្មណ៍និងការតភ្ជាប់របស់អ្នកជាមួយនឹងអាណាចក្រសម្ភារៈ។បំណងប្រាថ្នាសម្រាប់ភាពប្រណីតបន្ថែមទៀតនឹងជម្រុញឱ្យអ្នកស្វែងរកថវិកាបន្ថែមនិងគំនិតរកលុយដ៏អស្ចារ្យអាចបង្កើនសក្តានុពលក្នុងការរកប្រាក់ចំណូលរបស់អ្នកយ៉ាងខ្លាំង។ភពព្រហស្បតិ៍និងឥទ្ធិពលរបស់ភពព្រះអង្គារក្នុងការធ្លាក់នេះនេះនាំមកនូវការប៉ះ MidAs ដែលទាក់ទងនឹងការខិតខំរបស់អ្នកដោយផ្តល់ភាពជោគជ័យដល់អ្នកដែលអ្នកចិញ្ចឹមបីបាច់។កុំខ្លាចក្នុងការធ្វើប្រតិបត្តិការបន្តិចនៅខាងក្រៅតំបន់លួងលោមរបស់អ្នកនៅពេលអ្នកមានមូលដ្ឋានគ្រឹះរឹងមាំដើម្បីត្រលប់មកវិញ។ការអភិវឌ្ឍគួរឱ្យរំភើបនឹងផ្លាស់ប្តូរទស្សនវិស័យរបស់អ្នកនៅយប់នេះនៅពេលបារតនិងអ៊ឺរ៉ុបតម្រឹម។
